ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We showed great kindness to Musa and Harun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We were indeed gracious to Moses and Aaron,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily We bestowed Our favours on Moses and Aaron
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We certainly bestowed Our favor upon Moses and Aaron
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We indeed did a great favour to Moosa and Haroon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And, indeed We gave Our grace to Musa and Harun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We conferred a favor on Musa and Haroun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We also favoured Moses and Aaron,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We verily gave grace unto Moses and Aaron,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We also bestowed Our favour on Moses and Aaron:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We gave grace Unto Musa and Harun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We favoured Moses and Aaron,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Again (of old) We bestowed Our favour on Moses and Aaron,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And, indeed We gave Our Grace to Musa (Moses) and Harun (Aaron).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We also favored Moses and Aaron
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We blessed Moses and Aaron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We did certainly confer favor upon Moses and Aaron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:114] And verily We favoured Moses and Aaron, with prophethood,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We verily gave grace unto Moses and Aaron) by bestowing upon them prophethood and complete surrender unto Him,
